definition: quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: The coloured grounds are traditionally brush applied before the design is block printed.
sentences.chinese: 理由是傳統的彩色刷設計是前申請刻本。

sentences.english: All the editions of Ming Dynasty originate from the Zhe edition.
sentences.chinese: 明代各個重刻本都出自浙本，亦無出自蜀刻之書。

sentences.english: There were various extant block-printed editions of it published under the Yuan and early Ming dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 現存有元代與明前期的各種仿宋刻本或重刻本。

sentences.english: There were various extant block-printed editions of it published under the Yuan and early Ming dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 現存有元代與明前期的各種仿宋刻本或重刻本。

definition: manuscript (of a book etc)/sketch (of a design etc)
to record/to put down in writing
to proofread/to revise one or more editions of a text using an authoritative edition as a source book/to editorially revise a text
to set in print/to diffuse/to publish
short comment or critical appraisal added at the end of a text, on a painting etc
